Welcome to PHP Assistant. Here are the u: Welcome to PHP Assistant. Here are the usage instructions.
This application comes with a bundled PH: This application comes with a bundled PHP version.
If you have any other version, the appli: If you have any other version, the application will attempt to automatically discover where PHP is. If not possible, you should indicate where the PHP executable/binary is located.
If you installed tools such as XAMPP, yo: If you installed tools such as XAMPP, you can use PHP that came along.
Once you are ready, click the button bel: Once you are ready, click the button below to proceed.
PHP Assistant works in two ways: as a co: PHP Assistant works in two ways: as a common application and as an application of the notification bar. You can change this later.
Depending on the Linux distribution, sta: Depending on the Linux distribution, status bar mode may not work.
